mean_cn: n.（幽门到直肠间的）肠子；  adj.直觉的，本能的；  vt.取出内脏
mean_en: the tube in the body through which food passes when it leaves the stomach; the organs in and around the stomach, especially in an animal
sentence: Gut is the tube in the body where food passes when it leaves the stomach.
sentence_trans: 肠子就是食物在人体内离开胃时通过的管道。
